title: The Vampire Diaries - Season 1 - Multi-Subs
description:
This is the DvD Boxset of The Vampire Diaries - Season 1 - with all 

Twenty-Two Episodes




Audio: English 5.1



Subtitles: English / Swedish / Danish / Finnish / Norwegian / Dutch


Subtitles for the Hearing Impaired: English


5 Discs


Extras include: Audiobook of 'The Awakening' by L.J.Smith (on Disc 5) + 4 

featurettes + Unaired Scenes + Audio Commentary in the Pilot + The vampire Diaries 

- A Darker truth Webisodes + Second Bite - Gag Reel





The vampire brothers Damon and Stefan Salvatore, eternal adolescents, having been leading 'normal' lives, hiding their bloodthirsty condition, for centuries, moving on before their non-aging is noticed. They are back in the Virginia town where they became vampires. Stefan is noble, denying himself blood to avoid killing, and tries to control his evil brother Damon. Stefan falls in love with schoolgirl Elena, whose best friend is a witch, like her grandma.

De vampier broers Damon en Stefan Salvatore, eeuwige pubers, hebben het voortouw genomen in de 'normale' leven, het verbergen van hun bloeddorstige staat, eeuwenlang, bewegen op voor hun niet-aging is opgevallen. Ze zijn terug in de Virginia stad waar zij werden vampiers. Stefan is nobel, zelf ontkennen bloed te doden te voorkomen, en probeert om zijn kwade broer Damon beheersen. Stefan wordt verliefd schoolmeisje Elena, wiens beste vriend is een heks, net als haar oma.
